title: Must return an error response if intended unassignee doesn't exist in invoker's organisation
specs: U1 - with a Solicitor role for a particular jurisdiction under an organisation to create, assign and unassign access to a case for another solicitor in their organisation - O1
U2 - with a solicitor role for the same jurisdiction within organisation - O1
U3 - with a solicitor role for the same jurisdiction within a different organisation from U1 - O2
U4 - with a Pui-CAA role for the same jurisdiction and in organisation - O2
is made by U1 and intends to unassign access to C1 for U2 and U3

body.message: Intended user to be unassigned has to be in the same organisation as that of the invoker.
